The transcript from CNBC quotes Biden as: I’m going to be Joe Biden," not "going to beat Joe Biden."
Multiple reporters and fact: checkers have pointed out that Biden's actual statement was "I’m going to be Joe Biden."
The context of the quote: in which Biden explains how he plans to stay true to his record, suggests that he was saying "be."
News reports from the Associated Press a: I’m going to be Joe Biden."
